search.query: |tstats count where `gcp_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type="compute.googleapis.com/Network" by resource.data.id, name, resource.data.routingConfig.routingMode, resource.data.subnetworks{} |eval projectid=replace(name,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/global\S+","\1") |eval vpcname=replace(name,"\S+\/networks\/(\S+)","\1") |search projectid=$project_tok$ |rename resource.data.subnetworks{} as subnetworks, resource.data.routingConfig.routingMode as "Routing Mode" |rex max_match=30 field=subnetworks "https:\/\/www.googleapis.com\/compute\/v1\/projects\/\S*\/regions\/(?<regionval>\S*)\/subnetworks\/(?<subnetnames>\S*)" |eval subs=regionval.":".subnetnames |stats list(subs) as "Region:Subnet Name" by projectid, vpcname, "Routing Mode" |rename projectid as "Project ID", vpcname as "VPC Name"

|tstats count where `gcp_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type="compute.googleapis.com/Subnetwork" by resource.data.network, resource.location, resource.data.name, resource.data.ipCidrRange, resource.data.gatewayAddress |rename resource.data.network as network |eval projectid=replace(network,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/global\S+","\1") |eval vpcname=replace(network,"\S+\/networks\/(\S+)","\1") |search projectid=$project_tok$ |stats list(resource.location) as Location list(resource.data.name) as "SubNet Name" list(resource.data.ipCidrRange) as "IP CIDR Range", list(resource.data.gatewayAddress) as "Gateway Address", by vpcname |rename vpcname as "VPC Name"

`gcp_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type=compute.googleapis.com/Firewall |spath output=data path=resource.data |eval projectid=replace(name,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/global\S+","\1") |rename resource.data.network as vpcname |eval vpc=replace(vpcname,"\S+\/networks\/(\S+)","\1") |rex max_match=20 field=data "\{\"IPProtocol\":\"(?<Protocol>\w+)\"(,\"ports\":\[(?<Ports>\"[^\]]*))*" |rex max_match=20 field=data "\"sourceRanges\":\[(?<sourceRanges>\"[^\]]*)" |rex max_match=20 field=data "\"sourceTags\":\[(?<sourceTags>\"[^\]]*)" |dedup resource.data.name |table projectid, vpc, resource.data.name, resource.data.priority, resource.data.direction,Protocol, sourceRanges, Ports, sourceTags, resource.data.logConfig.enable, resource.data.description |rename resource.data.name as "Firewall Name", resource.data.priority as Priority, resource.data.direction as "Direction", resource.data.logConfig.enable as "Logs Enabled", resource.data.description as Description
